name: NBA 1986-1987 Season
overview: An add on to the NBA game, the NBA 1986-1987 Season includes all 23 NBA teams including the division leaders the Celtics, Lakers, Mavericks and Hawks! Coach the Chicago Bulls and Michael Jordon and see if his 2,279 field goal attempts will help his team to the top of the division. Or, will Boston's great shooters (Parish scoring 56% of the time, McHale 60% and Bird 53%) help them take it all? But beware the Lakers and Abdul-Jabbar; his 56% shooting percentage is always an on-court threat!
